plot outline: The film is based on the true story of a brave woman from Dhule in Maharashtra. The incident had taken place 30 years ago. Pashbandh presents the woman's fight against all the trouble she faced in her life, to rise up respectfully in society.
title: Pashbandh
plot: The film is based on the true story of a brave woman from Dhule in Maharashtra. The incident had taken place 30 years ago. _Pashbandh_ (qv) presents the woman's fight against all the trouble she faced in her life, to rise up respectfully in society.
